name: Toyota
description: Toyota is a Japanese automotive manufacturer known for its reliable, fuel-efficient, and affordable vehicles.

name: BMW
description: BMW is a German luxury automaker famous for its high-performance vehicles and cutting-edge technology.

name: Tesla
description: Tesla is an American electric vehicle manufacturer known for its innovative EVs and autonomous driving features.

name: Ford
description: Ford is an American automaker famous for its trucks, SUVs, and iconic muscle cars like the Mustang.

name: Ferrari
description: Ferrari is an Italian luxury sports car manufacturer synonymous with speed, performance, and exclusivity.

name: Hyundai
description: Hyundai is a South Korean automaker known for producing affordable, stylish, and feature-packed vehicles.
